info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 11:17PM CDT until July 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND...HENRY AND SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 1117 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fairhaven to near Hooppole to Nekoma, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, East Moline, Kewanee, Cambridge, Silvis, Geneseo, Colona, Milan, Le Claire, Coal Valley, Galva, Hampton, Orion, Port Byron, Atkinson, Rapids City and Annawan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
